contentItem.name: com.silabs.content.demos.c8051f970dk.kit.si8051.c8051f970dk.demo.f97x_pca0_9-10-11bit_pwm_output
contentItem.label: PCA0 9-10-11Bit PWM Output
contentItem.description:
9-bit PWM Example

This example project uses the PCA's PWM Output Mode to generate a
9-bit PWM Square Wave that is modulated in real time. The software
example can be configured to output 10-bit and 11-bit resolution
PWM Square Waves by modifying the source code.
